channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: Breakingviews - 深圳让人看到中国住房的未来
item.description:
Breakingviews - Shenzhen offers glimpse of China's housing future https://t.co/SlYYh0EUaC https://t.co/SlYYh0EUaC

item.title: 智利一家环境法院部分撤销了允许谷歌在该国建设数据中心的许可，要求这家美国公司修改其申请，以考虑气候变化的影响。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
A Chilean environmental court partially reversed a permit allowing Google to build a data center in the country, asking the US company to revise its application to take into account the effects of climate change. More here: https://t.co/cPztanykSk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 据 @路透社报道，欧盟委员会正在调查微软是否阻止客户依赖其竞争对手的某些安全软件。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
The European Commission is probing if Microsoft is preventing customers from relying on certain security software from its competitors, according to a document that regulators sent to at least one rival in January, seen by @Reuters. More here: https://t.co/dsLQpOMsyl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 碧桂园称，该陷入困境的开发商因未偿还价值 2.05 亿美元的贷款而被申请清盘，这使中国受流动性危机影响的房地产行业雪上加霜。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Country Garden said a liquidation petition has been filed against the embattled developer for non-payment of a loan worth $205 million, adding to the woes for China's liquidity crisis-hit property sector. More here: https://t.co/Mp44nLkb6W

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：挪威邮轮控股公司（Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings）预计第一季度盈利，美国对加勒比海和欧洲游的需求旺盛，该公司相信自己正驶向光明的未来。
item.description:
WATCH: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings believes it is sailing into a bright future as it forecasts a first-quarter profit and demand in the US for trips to the Caribbean and Europe https://t.co/hfOBQ7393M pic.twitter.com/4NLwhRT00Q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffet）曾经推动伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）涉足公用事业，其理论依据是利润可以再投资几十年。现在他警告说，电力供应商可能面临不祥的未来。@rob_cyran 解释了变化的原因。阅读更多
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Warren Buffet once pushed Berkshire Hathaway into utilities on the theory that profit could be reinvested for decades. Now he warns that electricity providers may face an ominous future. @rob_cyran explains what changed. Read more: https://t.co/mZRKivbHBl pic.twitter.com/WpaCeiI5MW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 比特币创下两年来的新高，原因是有迹象表明有大型玩家在购买这种加密货币，而较小的竞争对手以太坊自2022年以来首次突破3200美元。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Bitcoin hit a two-year high on signs of large players buying the cryptocurrency, while smaller rival ether topped $3,200 for the first time since 2022. More here: https://t.co/OEBvMngrzC pic.twitter.com/077ttZNAM1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 巴西 XP 因固定收入增长，季度利润增长 33
item.description:
Brazil's XP posts 33% rise in quarterly profit on fixed income growth https://t.co/Xh2Ia0P2oI pic.twitter.com/XDHqF50VoG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 看美国的流媒体用户增长率从 2022 年的 21.6% 降至去年的 10.1%，减半的另一个迹象表明，流媒体行业在这一关键市场的繁荣期可能已经结束。
item.description:
WATCH: Streaming subscriber growth in the US halved last year to 10.1% from 21.6% in 2022, in another sign that the boom might be over for the industry in the key market https://t.co/I92SGGVncn pic.twitter.com/B8mabkluuE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：向更多的高端零售商销售产品，为特定市场量身定制更多产品，减少品牌代言人的数量，提高品牌知名度，这些都是彪马试图提升自身形象的方式，因为这个德国运动品牌警告说，公司正处于艰难时期。
item.description:
WATCH: Selling to more upmarket retailers, creating more products tailored to specific markets, and focusing on fewer, higher-profile brand ambassadors are among the ways Puma is trying to boost its image as the German sportswear brand warns of tough times https://t.co/9g7NMugnUz pic.twitter.com/pTESTxcO2v

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：美股收盘接近持平，通胀和其他经济数据将揭示美联储可能的降息时机
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks closed near flat ahead of inflation and other economic data that could shed light on the possible timing of a Federal Reserve interest rate cut https://t.co/NagNe5W2md pic.twitter.com/UOUOZvT7jA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 索尼将在其 PlayStation 部门裁员约 900 人，并关闭伦敦的一家工作室，因为该公司在经历大萧条后正努力寻找立足点。更多信息
item.description:
Sony will cut about 900 jobs at its PlayStation unit and shut a London studio as the company struggles to find footing after a post-pandemic slump. Read more: https://t.co/QM1vbF2cBt pic.twitter.com/yPLgWNj5b4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：沃伦-巴菲特承认自己犯了一个 "代价高昂的错误"，他认为电力公司是 "可靠的"。气候变化增加了风险，回报滞后。以下是 @rob_cyran 关于变化的内容
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Warren Buffet admitted he made a ‘costly mistake’ in deeming electricity utilities as ‘reliable.’ Climate change raised risk and returns are lagging. Here's @rob_cyran on what changed https://t.co/mZRKivb9LN pic.twitter.com/42Zx0ow7Cv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 加密货币比特币因出现大量机构买盘而创下 57,000 美元以上的两年新高，而规模较小的竞争对手以太币两年来首次突破 3,200 美元。
item.description:
Cryptocurrency bitcoin hit a two-year high above $57,000 on signs of heavy institutional buying, while smaller rival ether topped $3,200 for the first time in two years https://t.co/OEBvMngrzC pic.twitter.com/ojw1793fGD

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：日本核心消费者物价指数涨幅为2%，符合日本央行的目标。日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，由于通胀率连续第三个月放缓，他希望在看到物价持续上涨的迹象后再对利率采取行动。
item.description:
WATCH: At 2%, the gain in Japan's core consumer prices index is in line with the Bank of Japan’s target. Governor Kazuo Ueda said he wants to see signs of sustained price rises before moving on rates as the inflation slowed for a third straight month https://t.co/U73xgwuMay pic.twitter.com/oNY7cXBkw5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：2023 年，美国流媒体平台的用户增长减半。增长速度从2022年的21.6%放缓至去年的10.1
item.description:
WATCH: Subscriber growth for streaming platforms in the United States halved in 2023. Growth slowed to 10.1% last year from 21.6% in 2022 https://t.co/I92SGGVncn pic.twitter.com/EXoxoAIoZe

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：德国运动服品牌彪马（Puma）表示，在充满挑战的市场环境下，预计今年上半年将表现疲软，但该公司股价仍有小幅上涨，原因是该公司坚持了 1 月份制定的年度目标，并宣布了一项旨在提升品牌形象的新活动 $PUMG
item.description:
WATCH: Puma expects a weak first half of the year in a challenging market, the German sportswear brand said, but its shares rose slightly as it stuck to annual targets set in January and announced a new campaign to boost its brand https://t.co/9g7NMugnUz $PUMG pic.twitter.com/aqVTRfJUgS

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 摩根大通首席财务官预计第一季度交易收入将下降
item.description:
JPMorgan CFO expects trading revenue to decline in first quarter https://t.co/EvgZqbwEGy pic.twitter.com/AyDJOJDJA8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚妇女事务部长凯蒂-加拉格尔（Katy Gallagher）在澳大利亚政府公布性别薪酬差距数据时说："如果有三分之二的企业存在有利于男性的性别薪酬差距，那么这个国家就存在很大的问题。更多信息
item.description:
'There is a substantial problem in this country when you've got essentially two thirds of businesses with a gender pay gap in favour of men,' Minister for Women Katy Gallagher said, as the Australian government released data on gender pay gaps. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC2aey pic.twitter.com/8e9sj9JImz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024
